mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board_table
mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents})
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id = #{id}
update board_table set boardWriter=#{boardWriter}, boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id = #{id}
